Content: A valuable lecture on Human Immune Deficiency Virus and Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (HIV/AIDS) was conducted at the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) on Monday (3) to coincide with the World AIDS day (December 1). This awareness lecture organized following a suggestion made by the Commander Security Forces - Mullaittivu was attended by more than 200 Army personnel including Officers. Captain R.F.T Premarathna of Mullaittivu Army Base Hospital, Warrant Officer-1 T.G.P Dayarathna, Public Health Inspector and Corporal T Samarasinha of the Army Base Hospital delivered lectures.
